reviews.text: After staying at the Jeddah Hilton for eight days, we were forced to move to alternative accommodations due to the international oil summit in Jeddah. Seems the king wanted a place to stay for all the foreign dignitaries, so we ended up at this Ramada. It may not really be a fair comparison, but the Ramada Continental just didn't come close to our previous living arrangements.
reviews.title: Avoid This Place if You Can

likes.liked: — It was a place to stay
